Introduction

Hello, I am Kevin Wong!

This website was created by me. I am a Statistics student at the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign. I LOVE my school! Go Illini!


On this website, you can find out more information about me. I enjoy mathematics and computer science. My dream job is to do financial analysis one day for a company.


I will be graduating from the University of Illinois in Spring 2019. My college GPA is currently \(3.85\).
